bibl.title: Georg Dittmann e Max Pohlenz per Otto Skutsch ed un poco di philologia per epistulas.
bibl.note: In 1933 Georg Dittmann and Max Pohlenz wrote to Girolamo Vitelli to ask his support to find a position for Otto Skutsch, who was going to loose his job because of his Jewish heritage. - Pp. 292-298: Appendice. Two letters from Pohlenz to Vitelli with corrections and notes about the Callimachean Diegeseis and Euphorion; one letter by A.S.F. Gow to Vitelli about Euphorion; one postcard from Rudolf Keydell to Medea Norsa about Euphorion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rosario Pintaudi, Georg Dittmann e Max Pohlenz per Otto Skutsch ed un poco di philologia per epistulas.

In 1933 Georg Dittmann and Max Pohlenz wrote to Girolamo Vitelli to ask his support to find a position for Otto Skutsch, who was going to loose his job because of his Jewish heritage. - Pp. 292-298: Appendice. Two letters from Pohlenz to Vitelli with corrections and notes about the Callimachean Diegeseis and Euphorion; one letter by A.S.F. Gow to Vitelli about Euphorion; one postcard from Rudolf Keydell to Medea Norsa about Euphorion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
